T02D3779:220b-0: @220b * // chu gtor gyis cho ga bzhugs//
T02D3779:220b-2: # // thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3779:220b-3: chu gtor gyi yo byad rnams mdun du sta gon
T02D3779:220b-4: byas la rang dang por sgrub thabs bzhin lha'i rnal
T02D3779:220b-6: lus dang ngag dang yid gsum byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D3779:220b-7: de nas aom sva bh'a shuddha:sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho nya ham zhes brjod do //
T02D3779:220b-8: rang ma gtogs pa'i snod bcud thams cad stong pa nyid du bsams te /
T02D3779:220b-9: de nas stong pa nyid kyis ngang las mdun du
T02D3779:220b-10: snod du yod kyi thad kar pam ljang gu re
T02D3779:220b-11: bsams la / de dag yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3779:220b-12: rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i snod re
T02D3779:220b-13: bsams la / re bsam / snod byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D3779:220b-14: bcud ni snod re re'i nang du bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin dang /
T02D3779:220b-15: sman sna tshogs las grub pa'i ljon shing dang /
T02D3779:220b-16: rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i gter gyi bum pa dang /
T02D3779:220b-17: dar la sogs pa gos sna tshogs pa bsam mo //
T02D3779:220b-18: sman shing ljon pa de rtsa ba phun sum tshogs bar zug ba /
T02D3779:220b-20: yal ga bzang brgyas pa dang /
T02D3779:220b-21: me tog dang 'bras bu mang ba phun sum tshogs pa bsams la /
T02D3779:220b-22: ljon shing de'i lus la sku gsungs thugs ye shes
T02D3779:220b-23: kyi rang bzhin can gyi aom a'a:h'um ho rnams rim
T02D3779:220b-25: dam tshig gi gtor ma sbyang ba'o //
T02D3779:221a-0: yi ge de rnams las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs @221a * //
T02D3779:221a-1: pa thams cad kyi thugs dam bskul nas de dag
T02D3779:221a-2: gi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi mdog
T02D3779:221a-3: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho lta bu'i chu'i rgyun bkug nas
T02D3779:221a-4: 'ongs pa dang / de dag thams cad ro gcig
T02D3779:221a-5: tu gyur pas dri ro gcig pa nus pa phun
T02D3779:221a-7: ye shes kyi gtor ma dgug pa'o //
T02D3779:221a-8: de nas sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyi snying gnas
T02D3779:221a-9: 'od zer lcags kyu dang zhags pa lta bu byung
T02D3779:221a-10: nas 'gro ba rigs lnga so so rang rang gi
T02D3779:221a-11: gzugs kyis mdun gyi bar snang la dgug go //
T02D3779:221a-13: rdo rje thal mo bca' ba 'am rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags 'dis bstab par bya'o //
T02D3779:221a-14: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba
T02D3779:221a-15: lo ki te sambha ra sambha ra h'um 'dis kha
T02D3779:221a-16: drag zhan med par mnyam por thob par bsam mo
T02D3779:221a-17: // aom ru ru spu ru dzva la tishtha siddha
T02D3779:221a-18: lo ts'a ne sarba aartha s'a dha ne sv'a h'a
T02D3779:221a-19: // / sngags 'di gnyis lan bdun bdun bzlas la bstab po //
T02D3779:221a-20: sngags 'og mas ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam
T02D3779:221a-21: pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa'i longs spyod dang
T02D3779:221a-22: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sogs pa'i so so'i
T02D3779:221a-23: rnam par rig pa dang mthun pa thob par bsam
T02D3779:221a-24: mo // de ni zang zing gi sbyin pa'o //
T02D3779:221a-25: de nas chos kyi sbyin pa ni zhal nas gsungs
T02D3779:221a-26: pa'i mdo tshigs su bcad pa ci nus ci lcogs
T02D3779:221a-27: kyis bya'o // de nas smon lam gdab po //
T02D3779:221a-28: de nas bden pa bdar ba ni /
T02D3779:221a-29: sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /
T02D3779:221a-36: bdag gi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis
T02D3779:221a-37: so so'i sems can gyi gnod pa thams cad zhi
T02D3779:221a-38: nas bar chad dang gnod 'gal spangs te dam tshig
T02D3779:221a-39: la gnas par gyur cig / de nas smon lam
T02D3779:221a-40: ni / dam chos bdud rtsi thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02D3779:221a-41: zhal nas gsungs pa bsil pa'i ro 'di yis //
T02D3779:221a-42: nyon mongs 'bar ba'i mi yis gdungs pa yi //
T02D3779:221a-43: 'gro kun rtag tu sdug bsngal zhi byed shog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gdab po //
T02D3779:221a-44: de nas sems can thams cad kyi lus ngag yid
T02D3779:221a-45: gsum gyi sgrib pa byang nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs te
T02D3779:221a-46: so so'i bsam pa dang mthun pa'i longs spyod rgya
T02D3779:221b-0: chen po thob nas dam tshig la gnas shing @221b
T02D3779:221b-1: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rtogs nas bdag
T02D3779:221b-2: la phan 'dogs pa'i bsam pas aom mu: zhes brjod
T02D3779:221b-3: nas se gol gtogs nas so so'i gnas su song
T02D3779:221b-4: bar blta'o // rkyen dang bar chad thams cad zlog
T02D3779:221b-5: par byed pa yon tan thams cad nye bar sdud
T02D3779:221b-6: par byed pa chu gtor dri ma med pa'i gzhung
T02D3779:221b-7: slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad
T02D3779:221b-9: / slob dpon de nyid la zhu ba po kan
T02D3779:221b-10: ston legs pa'i shes rab kyis tshogs bsag pa'i yan
T02D3779:221b-11: lag tu zhus nas mang yul gyi grong du gzhung
